short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PushStaq interconnect user devices and apps integrations to one ecosystem of messages and notifications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PushStaq Chrome extension allows you to send and share current page link that you are viewing to any device such as mobile phones, tablets and other computers.

When sending the page to any of your devices you can:
✔️ Get a real time notification

✔️ Copy and paste the link in target device

✔️ Save link to selected channel and read it later from any of your devices 

To learn more visit https://www.pushstaq.com
